name: GOD's DEATH
description: Get ready for a medieval adventure, full of mysteries and brutal monsters. Play as a little princess who faces against a horde of bloody critters and an invincible dragon god. It's told by the legends that the dragon god is born above the earth and beneath the sky.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8,10 Processor: Pentinium 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Desktop Resolution 640x480 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo Sound

reviews.review_text: From what I've played, it's pretty good. The gameplay isn't exactly innovative, but the combat system is pretty fun. The graphics aren't great, but the artstyle is unique. The sound is pretty good, the engine is pretty good. The controls are a little bad though. Overall a pretty good game.
